dialogue.name: Yvyteph Intro Root
lines: Greetings, brave Maya. I am Yvyteph, goddess of Desire. My roots run through all that lives and feels, and are knotted even more thoroughly in you than most of your kind.
You have been worshipping me all your life, even though you didn't know my face until today. Now that we have looked upon each other I know that you will serve me all the more passionately.

dialogue.name: Maya Is Confusion
lines: Hi! Um. I'm Maya. Very happy to meet you!

dialogue.name: Maya is Curiosity
lines: So... can I ask about your nips? Why does a tree lady need nipples? And kinda moreover, why boobs?

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Free Them
lines: For fun, of course; same thing yours are for 90% of the time. If you wish you may also suckle the essence of molten Desire from them. Is this your wish?
As for my enlarged breasts, well they're just lovely. And also joyous to play with!

dialogue.name: Maya Stranger Danger
lines: Cool, cool. Uh, maybe when we know each other a little better. They certainly are lovely... *ahem* ANyway...
thoughts: Sweet crumpets, how did she know I've always wondered what molten Desire tastes like?

dialogue.name: Maya in Heat
lines: Goddess of Desire, eh? I do see that.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Smug Certainty
lines: You haven't seen anything yet. Please me and I shall return the favor a thousand thousandfold.
Have you ever experienced your little death via drowning in your own fluid ecstasy, figuratively and literally? You will.

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Smug Certainty
lines: For now it pleases me to watch you play my little game. My daughter is new at material incarnation and she is learning much from your example.
Think of me and my essence as you do battle in the arena, and you shall surely triumph!

dialogue.name: Maya in Wonderland
lines: Where am I? This place seems kinda rough-hewn, and I recall having a face and not being quite so low-poly especially in the boobage region. There was like a separate body section and some soft body physics, it was a whole thing. And, hey, is my cleavage drawn on?!

dialogue.name: Yvyteph Megyle Mystery
lines: This world is a pocket dimension within the manifestation of my daughter Qyvnily that has taken root on Meigantu. We went to great pains to recreate a perfectly familiar setting and morphology for you.
Do you remember embracing her? The serpentfolk were chasing you. Your friends from the Chiropteran are all dead.
We offered you sanctuary. In exchange, we wish to learn from you. Your Desire is powerful, and your imagination keen.
The Incarnate Daughter has been sculpted from your own longing. Perhaps she will benefit from your guidance, should you prove cunning enough to overcome our trials.
